No, the book is not wrong. He was indeed born on Ansei 4, 12. 5 (=3D1858=
. 1.19.)

Ansei
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ansei

1868 (Keio 4) - 1857 (A=
nsei 4; even though he was born in Jan 1858, it was still Ansei 4 
and befo=
re the New Year of Ansei 5) + 1 =3D 12
